overview: After Carey's husband Jeff died, she accidentally found that Jeff was in love with a man named Matt before. How would she handle this? Had Jeff ever loved her? Could she forgive him? And at the same time, what will Matt do while he hasn't got Jeff's novel dedicated to him as he promised? A man dies, what changes shall it bring to other two people that loved him?
tagline: Does love allow you to forgive?
title: Caress
